111.content:
The birth of a new season, summer, was approaching, and every student was delighted by that very fact. Today was the last day of school, and when school was over, the children yelled and screamed in joy! Free from their prison, school, they were all returning home to begin their first taste of freedom in a long time. Not a single cloud stained the beautiful blue sunny sky, but there was a slight breeze to counteract with the blazing hot temperature.

In a long, narrow trail, a Latina girl jogged down the path, heading straight for home. Her name was Rosa; she was a fifteen year old girl, athletic, kindhearted girl. Just as for any other sport, she wore a black sports bra along with her black shorts and running shoes. Her entire midriff and arms were completely bare and exposed, revealing the slightly dark tannish tone on her smooth, bare skin. Other features would be her long black hair that was tied into a ponytail and her womanly curves. Her seemingly perfect body was greedily desired by many boys from school. Through sports and healthy diets, Rosa had maintained her healthy appealing body, but she had never used it for relationships.

Unfortunately for Rosa, boys were not the only predators that kept an eye on her body. A mystical hazy fog slowly phased out of thin air, and cloaked the Latina in a cloud of white haze. Squinting her eyes, Rosa lost her ability to see the road: “Where did this fog come from?” While jogging through the terribly thick fog, Rosa suddenly felt a steep hill, and she uncontrollable dashed down the slope by the force of gravity. Tripping over a stone, she tumbled down the grassy slope, rolling down the hill.

A swirling, mystical portal appeared, catching Rosa right into it. Where did the portal take Rosa?
111.title: The Start of Rosa's Adventure!

1111.content:
A swirling portal in the shape of a circle illuminated the brightest white light imaginable. Mystically existing on the grey, stoned ceiling, the flat disk shaped portal dropped a visitor who fell onto the solid stone floor. A second later, the portal dispersed into tiny sparkles that slowly faded away.

The sexy teen Latina, Rosa, kneeled on the rough, hard floor with her hands dragging across each gap between the stone bricks that made up the ground, walls, and ceiling. Her eyes glared left and right and all around her, making out the location that she fell in, but all she saw were grey, dull, rough, stone bricks everywhere. There weren’t any doors or windows. However, there was an opening from above in the shape of a small square, about a foot long in width and length. From that opening, the young girl could see a mystical bright full moon under the black cold night sky as it shined down its moonlight towards the girl’s eyes.

Mainly her upper body felt cold but not to the point of shivering. Wearing only a black sports bra as her top, her midriff and arms were vulnerable and sensitive to the sharp cold ominous air. Every breath she took was as if she was breathing fear itself that even her lungs were trembling in trepidation. Her heart felt heavy as it pounded from both fear and from her jogging. Confined in this room, there wouldn’t be much space for her to run anyways. The room was quite small, perhaps four by six meters in dimension? It was smaller than her bedroom, and she felt confined yet protected. However, she desperately wanted to find a way out of here soon.

Scanning around, she checked once more for any doors, hidden doors, tunnels, vents, any openings, but the only one that existed was the one above her. From the floor to the ceiling, it was twice her own height; she had no way of getting up there. Plus, not even her slender fit body would manage to fit within that small opening.

The ray of moonlight caused a wide beam of light that Rosa stood under; everywhere else in the room was dark but visible. She could make out the gaps between each brick and the distance of the walls from her own standpoint.

Ten minutes passed by and Rosa remained sitting under the moonlight, helpless in her situation. She was trapped and imprisoned. Soon after, a small drifting white sheet of paper fell from the opening above, landing onto the girl’s lap. Holding it in front of her face, she read it to herself: Remove a brick.

That was it. That was all it said, those three simple words. She didn’t know who send this message, but she obeyed it nonetheless. Walking over towards a wall, she slipped her slender fingers between gaps, gripping onto a brick and pulled it out. To her surprise, the brick slipped out extremely easily. A dark hole remained on the wall where she took out the brick. Soon, Rosa pulled out another stone brick after settling the first one down on the floor. Without warning, the brick that she held in her hands morphed and shift shaped into handcuffs, locking her wrists together. The brick on the ground morphed into a pair of cuffs as well, locking her ankles together. Rosa soon fell and landed on her butt.

Terrified, the Latina could not control her limbs anymore, at least not willingly. Her hands immediately launched forth to grab her left feet, tugging off her own sneaker and sock. Soon her hands were forced to take off her right sneaker and sock, leaving the girl completely barefooted.

Rosa then thought that these cuffs were going to force her to strip the rest of her clothes, but she was wrong. Her arms were shot straight up, out of her control. Pulling her wrists backwards, these cuffs with a mind of their own caused the poor girl bend her arms behind her head, exposing her armpits. The cuffs of her ankles manipulated her body as well as they forced her feet to move without her control at all. Like magnets, two pairs of cuffs joined as once behind the girl’s back, causing Rosa to lay flat on her belly in a hogtied position.

1112.content:
Swirling fluids of violet and black energy spun at every angle imaginable around her as if she was trapped in the center of a whirlpool. One who had never experienced this can never understand how she felt, but an ominous sensation of evil and hungry lust was felt, sending a chilling shiver down her spine. Her eyes goggled as her head jerked around to gain a sense of her new environment. Before fear could even be registered in her mind, there was an dark opening beneath her. She was falling, plummeting, but who or what awaited her at the end of this magical tunnel.

The portal shrank into a single dot before vanishing into sparkles of light after the teen girl exited it from up above. Everything suddenly felt cold like an autumn morning, and while this cooled her down after her jog, it also enhanced her fear. Bare skin being exposed to the cold air only gave her a sense of vulnerability. She felt her wrists and elbows catching what felt like thin threads, but her weight only ripped the threads straight through. The further she fell down below, more threads tangled up around her limbs and body, and soon she realized how they stuck onto her like glue as if she was covered in threads of cotton candy. Her body spun and twirl in midair as she struggled, twisting these sticky webs around herself until she crashed to a halt. Whatever she landed on felt like a trampoline that bounced back and forth when she fell on top of it, her back pressed against it while her face looked up towards the ceiling that was a hundred meters above.

Lying flat, parallel to the ground –if there was a ground or floor-, Rosa’s first instinct was to stand up and gingerly check her surroundings. Her arms and legs were spread out to where her body from a bird’s eye view would be an X-shape, and changing that vulnerable shape was a problem. Pulling and tugging her limbs, it took her full strength as a girl just to move a few inches, but like a rubber bend, the stubborn web reverted her back into the exact same position.

I can’t move! Why? What is this icky, gross stuff? W-wait… it can’t be… a spider web?

The loss of freedom in her movements frightened her; she felt like a bird trapped in a cage. Wiggling and squirming was heavily minimized. Glancing around as far as her neck allowed her to turn, she found herself within the largest cavern she had ever seen. The walls appeared like a mile high while spanning out even greater than its height. Barely being able to see her own feet, her eyes noted that the direction her feet pointed towards was giant ragged semi-circular opening that brought a dim light into the cave as well as shadows hiding behind each and every spikes and rocks.

Rosa didn’t have to be a speleologist to know that this cave was unusual, and it wasn’t just its sheer size. Thousands of strands of silky white web hung from the ceiling above that branched off into a cluster of sticky mess, and the giant web that she was lying on was the largest of them all as well as the most symmetrically crafted that stuck onto the walls with some of the surroundings webs to support it where the thickness was on par with a pencil. That was freakishly thick, and if spiders were the creators of this, she was too afraid to imagine just how large they would be.

Rosa still hasn’t given up on breaking these webs with her persistent struggle, but her list of reasons for escaping only grew longer when a shadowy figure from up above dropped down. It wasn’t falling exactly, but descending at a quick and constant speed. Imagine a pair of hands with the wrists pressed together and the fingers wiggling outwards; that was how large this thing was, probably over half a foot long. This massive spider produced a single strand of web while seemingly hovering straight down, right on top of the girl.

“AAHHHH! NO! GET AWAY!” Rosa screamed, terrified by the critter, but those eight wiggling arms could be nothing else other than a spider. Her rebellious struggle grew more violent while chanting fearfully, “GET AWAY! GET AWAY! GET AWAY!” A high-pitched scream turned into a sobbing sound as she realized the futility of breaking free. A part of her wanted to close her eyes, not wishing to see this disgusting creature up close, but her eyes remained wide open, even more terrified as to what the creature was doing.

The black spider –only a baby in comparison to the adult version- stopped itself, hanging by a thread, only a few inches over the girl’s exposed midriff. There was a traumatizing pause as the arachnid was perfectly still as if it was dead, and Rosa starred with a horrified expression as she held her breath like she forgot how to breathe. Rather, she was too afraid to breathe and too afraid to move. No longer struggling, she was as motionless as the spider.

Please! Go away! I hate spiders! Please… leave me alone!

The constricted girl was straining her neck just to see the ugly thing over her belly, so her head moved back towards the ceiling with a black figure at the bottom corner of her eyes. Just seeing the spider brought the sensation of disgust into her chest.

As the spider simply hung there, its eight legs began to wiggle randomly and excitedly. The very tips of its thin stick-like legs stroked against the girl’s stomach at a rapid pace.

Rosa flinched when her worst fear came into physical contact on her body, and her look of trepidation was mixed with a held back smile. Her eyes closed shut, but her mouth opened wide, bursting with laughter, “AH-HA-HA-HA-HA-HA-HA-HA-HA-HA-HA-HA-HA-HA-HA! Stop it! HE-HA-HA-HA-HA-HA-HA-HA-HA-HA-HA-HA-HA!” Somehow, saying words like ‘stop it’ or ‘please’ felt meaningless if it couldn’t understand her language, but she continued to say them in her series of pleading and ticklish laughter. What evolutionary benefit would a spider have by tickling her? Why was it doing this to her?

Thrashing around her bondage, the poor Latina regretted to be wearing her black sports bra today. Her entire smooth and tender belly was exposed entirely as well as being helpless and defenseless. In her mind, it felt as if an hour has passed by, but in reality, it was only one minute. Each second of her torment, she thought she was at her limit and would faint, but the next second would only prove her wrong.

With her eyes closed shut as she laughed and giggled, she was completely unaware of the ten other spiders, each almost identical to the first, descending down on a single thread of their webs. The first one the land had crashed onto Rosa’s face.

The girl’s eyes opened widely, shocked to find one of these ugly things to be this close. One of them was bad enough, but now there were two? Her vision was blocked off by the black spider; all she saw was darkness. She wanted to keep her mouth closed, but the never stopping ticking had her laughing to the extreme. Touching her face was what she thought was the worst place of all, but it was even worse when a pair of pincers slipped into her mouth, causing her laughter to be filled with scream of agony. The spider produced and coiled its web into a spherical shape that grew larger and larger. As the spider crawled down to Rosa’s neck, the girl regained her vision, but her mouth was muffled and gagged by a ball of web. It was gross! She wanted to spit it out, but it remained stuck like glue. Her mouth was as wide open as it can get, and all that came out of it was a mumble of laughter that was much quieter, “MMM! MMMMM! MM!” From the neck, the spider crawled beneath the girl’s elastic bra with the fabric pressing its body against the girl’s shapely breasts.

Before Rosa can even spend her time in such torment, her head perked up somewhat, and her eyes widened by the sheer madness of her situation. There were other spiders, much more that were already crawling on the same web as she was in, and the worst part was that they were crawling towards her. These spiders were no longer handing like the one over her tummy; these spiders actually crawled over her body.

It all happened simultaneously. There was a spider one each side of her armpits, tickling her in those exposed spots with their multiple yet skillful wiggling arms. Three spiders crawled down the girl’s black sweatpants where the elastic cloth made it a tight squeeze. One of them was at her groin, and a spider crawled down each of her leg. All of their legs excitedly wiggled around, and the one inside her bra was fondling with her breasts. The last pair of spiders were each at opposite ends at Rosa’s sides; they each participated in the ganged-up tickling at the tender skin of her midriff’s sides.

Under the mercy of one of the witch’s many pets, Rosa endured painless torture beyond her imagination. Five minutes passed by –the longest five minutes of her life-, and she was still conscious, barely conscious. Far away from home, inside a cave of spiders and webs, being tickled mercilessly while gagged, there was no one to save her. No one probably even knows that she was here. But, there was one person who does know: the witch.

113.content:
Time seemed to stretch and elongate itself, making her entire history class longer and lethargic. Cramped in a room with the accumulated body heat of everyone’s, Abigail felt a droplet of sweat flowing down the side of her neck, sending a tingling sensation. So warm and humid in here, the air itself was almost suffocating as he brain was slowly being deprived of fresh oxygen which led to her drowsy and sleepy state of mind. Her head felt like it weighed as much as a watermelon, unable to keep support it, she let her head lay flat down on the desk with her arms cushioning it from below. Eyeing on the projected screen of the PowerPoint slides that they students were supposed to take down, she remained resting, merely listening to the teacher’s voice while blankly staring at the screen.

As soon as the school bell rung, a spark of hope led her to believe that she was going to make it out of it alive. With this class over, school was essentially over for the day, but she stayed afterschool to practice swimming, an afterschool club that she was a member of. Entering the girl’s locker room, Abigail prepared to change into her swimsuit until she realized in utter shock that her swimsuit wasn’t inside her backpack. It was too late to return home now since all the buses had left by now, so the girl with long black hair entered the swimming pool while sitting at on a bench near the side. If she couldn’t participate, she might as well watch and observe her classmates swim.

While most of the girls were still in the locker room, a few of them were early, swimming laps back and forth from start to end and then reverse in freestyle. Suddenly, a peculiar source of light under the water caught her attention. It was bright yet almost swirling. Leaving her seat, Abigail strode towards the edge of the swimming pool in her pink flip-flops to get a closer look and also to ask if the other swimmers could see it. However, just as she approached towards the pool, she failed to notice the ground being slippery wet, and as she stepped onto the puddle, she slipped forward and plummeted into the water.

Upon surfacing back up above the water level, she gasped for air and breathed heavily. Now, her sleeveless baby blue shirt and short jeans (a few inches longer her underwear) were drenching wet. Embarrassed at first, she brushed her accident from her mind easily when she glimpsed at the bright light below her. Holding her breath, she dived under the water, swimming closer and closer to the source of light, and what she saw was quite magical and sparkling.

An aura-like white swirling light laid flat on the floor of the pool, big enough for a human to fit in. The black-haired girl was hovering right above it as she scrutinized the strange illuminating light with her very own eyes. Being a swimmer, she could hold her breath for a great deal of time, so she didn’t have to resurface for a while. However, as Abigail touched the white light with her outstretching hand, she wouldn’t be resurfacing at all for her entire body was sucked right into the white light. Upon engulfing her entire body, the light shrunken smaller and smaller until it vanished.

Wanting to scream, she knew she couldn’t for she was still underwater. Everything around her was bright as the sun, beaming directly at her eyes, but soon the light disappeared. She managed to make out her surroundings. Everything was murky dark, and she appeared to be inside a cramped pipeline. Still submerged in water, she continued holding her breath. Behind her was a dead end, and if she wanted to breathe air again, she better swim forward in hopes of resurfacing again.

After swimming a good fifteen meters, she exited the pipeline, ending up in a larger scope of never-ending shadowy water. As of now, she quickly swam upwards for her time of holding her breath was running short. By the time she resurfaced, she gasped for air while coughing and panting. Looking around, she found herself at a…
113.title: Swim, Abigail! SWIM!

1132.content:
With everything defying logic and several laws of physics, Abigail remained speechless when she gazed at her surroundings. Further down the edge of the body of water, there stood a myriad of tall-standing trees with the ground shadowed by the countless green leafs. Grass and soil blanketed the terrain of pure nature, and she didn’t saw any civilization or signs of humans. Swimming towards the bank, her feet still didn’t felt the bottom of the enormous lake. Climbing out, she took her first few steps on dry land as drips of water rained down from her drenched clothing and hair. Her baby blue sleeveless shirt was darkened in color as it soaked up water like a sponge, sticking to her skin tightly while revealing the outlines of her bra underneath.

Abigail stroked her own hair, combing it with her hand before squeezing the water out of her wet, long, silky, black hair. Strolling further down, she began to enter the forest for it was the only direction she could travel to. Otherwise, the only other option would be to swim towards the other side of the lake, but she didn’t want to take chances on a place she was unfamiliar with. Deep down, she was terrified and confused, but at her age, she knew that it was best to remain calm. Only one question lingered in her mind: Where am I?

Five to ten minutes ago, she was at her school, and now, she ended up in a forest. Wait a minute! The answer was simple. She didn’t know how she arrived here, but if she went back to where she came from, maybe she could return back to school. That made sense, right? But, when she last checked, the giant pipeline only had one exit with a dead end on the other side. However, Abigail couldn’t help but ponder that she must have missed something when she was there. Being so afraid and confused, she might have missed a missing door or something.

Obviously, wandering in a forest would most definitely not lead her back to where she came from, and besides, she was a swimmer. After making up her mind from careful judgment, the black-haired girl chose to return back to where she came from. Striding back to the freshwater lake, Abigail sank her body back into the water, sandaled feet entered first. After taking several breaths to calm her nerves down, she held her breath as she dived into the deep water. Swimming deeper and deeper, the girl scanned around in search for an exit which became harder to do since the water grew darker the deeper she sank.

The moment she spotted the pipeline, she hurried into the cramped entrance. Everything grew really dark, difficult to see anything. By the time she reached the end of the long passageway, her hands pressed against the solid cool, rough surface. It was a dead end. She wanted to feel around to investigate, but the remaining time for her to hold her breath was running short. Curling her legs inward and upward, she pushed off of the surface with her legs, giving her an extra boost as she swam out of the pipeline. Heading towards the surface above, she was almost there, prepared to regain her oxygen supply for her lungs until she felt something coiling around her ankle. Flinching, Abigail glimpsed into the shadowy water down below, unable to make out what caught her ankle, but whatever it was, she couldn’t swim any further because of it. Tugging her captured ankle, she tried to nudge herself free but gave up as soon as she understood how powerful the grip was. Being able to feel countless of suction cups attached to the bare skin of her ankle, a sinking sensation aroused in her heart and mind.

With her other leg, she kicked the tentacle that wrapped around the other, but being underwater, her kick was weak as her sandals made it unsuitable for kicking. After repetitively kicking the grip, her resistance halted when another tentacle coiled around and squeezed around her other ankle. Meanwhile, she felt her entire body slowly sinking away from the world of breathable air. Desperately swinging her arms to swim back up, it all became futile when a tentacle immobilized each of her wrists.

Struggling and squirming from her bounds, the girl accidently kicked both her sandals off her feet, but that was of little concern to her given her current situation. Abigail could probably maintain her breath for another thirty seconds before it was all over for her. However, her calculations didn’t include the possibility of a pair of tentacles stroking its tips against the bare, tender, defenseless soles of her innocent feet. Exhaling some of her air, bubbles emitted from her nose, but she hanged on as best as she could. The stroking on her feet tickled her so much, and it bothered her from maintaining her breath.

This already unbearable torture had just gotten worse when another pair of whimsical tentacles played around with Abigail’s sensitive armpits. If only her shirt had some sleeves, she might be able to endure it a few seconds longer. Immediately, the girl exhaled all of her air supply from her lungs in a chuckle underwater, “HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA…” Just before she was about to suffocate and be put out of her misery, the tentacle that stroked her right armpit shifted and wrapped around the girl’s mouth and nose, blocking the water to be inhaled.

“Mmmm! MMMMmm!MMMM! mmm!” Mumbling in her gag, all of her wiggling and squirming were barely noticeable due to her restriction of movements. Tickled and tortured underwater, she was forced to suffer a little longer with her mouth and nose being covered. Until thirty seconds passed by, her mind faded away as Abigail fainted from the lack of air.

Meanwhile, on dry land, an intelligent bipedal panda cub waddled towards the lake with a fishing pole grasped in his paws. This adorable little black and white bear casted his fishing rod into the lake in hopes to catch a juicy fish to eat. To his surprise, he felt the hook at the end of the fishing wire being tugged by something, so it must be a fish, right?

Reeling it in, the standing panda cub tugged the rod with all its might until a strange looking fish was pulled out of the water. Confused at what type of fish it was, the panda wondered if he had discovered a new species of fish. This fish had limbs like a panda, but it didn’t have any scales or fur. It possessed long black hair on its head, too long to be considered fur. This fish didn’t have any webbed feet, so it most definitely wasn’t a frog. This unusual creature had tannish wet skin, and it wasn’t moving at all. What a delicate and fragile fish for it to have died the instant it pulled out of the water.

Gently laying the motionless corpse on the ground, the panda crawled around, analyzing this strange, unusual creature. Was it edible? He poked at two round bumps on the fish’s chest for he had never seen it before. Was it her gills to breathe underwater?

The moment Abigail coughed while lying flat on her back, the panda cub flinched backwards.
“GAHHH! IT LIVES!” The taking, bipedal panda cub scampered away on its two little legs, escaping into the forest, frightened by the mutated fish.

The earthy smell of nature purifies the chilly, fresh air. Autumn comes by expectedly with the trees in the woods raining down colorful orange and red leaves. A common small trail in the woods is always used for children to cross by afterschool to reach home. There is a metallic, wired fence on one side of the trail to prevent kids from falling into the river stream down below; the trees are on the other side.

It was early release, a time where happy children would gladly leave school early. A young girl strolls down the pathway in the woods alone as the other children probably reached home already. She took her time pacing slowly on the earthy trail to enjoy inhaling the fresh air that nature has to offer. The chilly air feels so refreshing.

A small, black kitten crosses the path in front of the girl’s own eyes. The kitten stops and turns its small head at the human girl, curiously looking with those large yellow eyes. The girl, whose name is Daniella, was lured in by the kitten’s irresistible cuteness. Her heart awes by the small mysterious feline.

Daniella steps silently towards the kitty as she opens her arms to hug it. In response, the black cat sprints away several yards then turns back to observe the girl. Daniella ends up chasing the kitty, following where it might end up to its owner. Unintentionally playing this game of tag, the kitten runs quickly on those small legs, dashing through the woods and zigzagging through dozen of trees. Poor Daniella attempts to follow the speedy devil, but her young human body can never compete against an animal.

From time to time, the kitten stops as if it’s waiting patiently for the girl to catch up to her. Daniella’s scarf and jacket that keeps her warm is slowing her down from her usual sprinting speed. Nevertheless, she smiles and chuckles while having fun catching up to the adorable black feline.

Suddenly, a flock of crows squawks loudly then flutters away into the sky. Daniella finds herself in a grassy part of the woods that’s coated in a layer of fallen autumn leaves. The black cat stops at the entrance of an old medieval household and meows. The door creeks open all on its own with no one opening it from the inside. It’s as if the door magically obeys the cat’s superior command. The small feline vanishes inside the dark interior of the household, and the human girl lost sight of it. At the very end, she saw a pair of coldblooded, yellow eyes glowing in the dark, staring at her.

Hesitantly deciding whether she should continue following the cat or return home, she could see her breath visible in this chilly atmosphere. Daniella’s eyes widens as she realizes a horrible fact. Where on earth is she? She is lost! How can she return home anyways?

Too distracted from chasing the cat, her sense of direction is diminished. She turns around and scan her surroundings but cannot determine which way is towards home. All the trees appear the same, camouflaged by the colorful leaves.

There is only one final choice left… she must continue to follow the cat and enter the unknown household. Little does she know that a wicked witch lured the young tender, fresh human by the feline who’s the witch’s minion?

Daniella accumulates what little confidence she has left in her heart, and enters the darkness!

To be continued…

115331112.title: Daniella's sticky situation!

choices: The kittens covers her in vegetable oil, then lemon juice!
The kitten toys with the girl!
1153312.content:
Entering in someone’s house, unwelcoming, Daniella feels rather rude to be intruding. She sees an old lady sitting peacefully in a rocking chair and sways back and forth like a cradle for a baby. The old woman appears to be in her 80’s with wrinkled skin and warm clothing. On her lap, the black kitten curls into a ball and naps there in the cutest manner. If it weren’t for the kitten’s innocence, Daniella would have left already.

The elder woman takes notice at her and smiles gently, “Ah! Looks like we have a visitor, what’s your name, little girl?” The lady speaks very kindly, and Daniella responds shyly towards her, “Um… Daniella.”

“Daniella, right?” Repeating the name, it seems that the lady’s old age has weakened her hearing. The girl nods in response. The old woman’s wrinkled hand strokes and caress the soft fur of her sleeping, black kitten. The feline’s coat of fur looks so soft that Daniella could just sleep on it like a pillow. The softness would make anyone relaxed.

“Daniella,” the woman repeats the name, “That’s a sweet name. So why have you come here, Daniella? Did my little kitten lure you here?”

“Mm,” Daniella nods humbly. Very shy towards strangers, Daniella feels uneasy speaking to her. Her voice would be too quiet for an old lady to hear, so she gestures instead.

“Please feel free to stay. You can play with my kitten, since that’s what you’re here for.” She smiles kindly towards her guest.

Daniella couldn’t resist the opportunity, “May I hold it?” She eagerly asks.

The lady holds the kitten with both hands, waking the feline, and hands it over to Daniella, “Of course, he won’t bite.”

Daniella holds the kitten for her first time and let him lay in her arms like rocking a baby. The black kitten would stare at her and from time to time stroke her lovingly and purrs. The girl would lean closer and rub her face onto the cat’s soft fur, so soft and comfortable.

“It’s actually quite warm in here; why don’t you hang your coat over there?” The lady points at the closet. “Oh, and remove your boots, I don’t want the carpet to get all dirty.”

Daniella respected her wishes and did as told. She removes her pink jacket and hangs it upon the closet, and she removes her pink boots and placed them aside. Barefooted with no socks on, simply standing on the rug sends slight sensation to her whole body. Very sudden, the doors of the closet shut tight, locking the visitor inside the closet. Everything is dark; she could not see a speck of light. Her first reaction is to call for help, “Um… Excuse me…,” a hand covered her mouth, “Mmmm! MHMMMM!”
Unseen but felt, hands sprouting from the ceiling of the closet gripped upon Daniella’s wrists, preventing her from slamming the door open. As she tries to kick, a pair of hands immobilizes her ankles from behind. The hands tugs on her wrists as far as it stretches above her head, then lifts the girl off her feet, hanging her several inches off the ground. A pair of hands begins wiggling its fingers upon the girl’s innocent small feet.

“Mmmmmm! Mhahammmhahahahammmmmahahahahammmmm!” Her laugh would potentially be louder, but the gag mutes her to a silent mumbling. Not loud enough for an old lady with hearing issues to hear her, Daniella will have to scream louder. Multiple hands assisted her to scream louder by pulling down her sweatpants and pulling up her pink shirt, revealing her legs and tummy in the darkness. Naturally, the hands target those exposed areas, mercilessly tickling her belly and her legs.
“Mhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhmh! MMMMMM! MHMHMHMHMHMH!” Laughing, screaming louder, her volume still isn’t enough.

After a minute of her abrasive silent laughter, she feels the hands withdrawn from her body. Knelling on the floor, she pants and gasps for air. A minute of struggling is enough to give her a good sweat. She shoves the closet door open to escape from the darkness. Once out of the closet, she is no longer inside the living room, “Hey! Are you there?” She looks around timorously as she blushes to herself in embarrassment. Her feet and legs are completely bare, and only light blue underwear covers her bottom. She pulls her shirt back down.

Scrutinizing around, she appears to be inside an oddly organized kitchen. A large black pot sits above a red hot flame, boiling the water that fills it fully. Jerking around, Daniella tries to relocate her clothing, but the stubborn closet shut the doors close in front of her face, locking them inside. Banging on the door, she tugs at the handle, “Open!”

The door complies and opens up which startles the girl into falling into the portal within it. She falls out of another portal that is above the pot. “AHHHHH!” A high girlish fearful shriek echo as she is falling head first towards the boiling pot of water. Her eyes meet a meter away from the humid water as her fall has stopped.

Hanging upside down, she sees her ankles being bound to chains that link to the ceiling. She feels the blood being rushed to her head.

“Are chu ready?” A black kitten speaks as he stands on a stool near the pot. The creature scrutinizes the girl with his powerful yellow feline eyes.

“W-what!?” This must all be a bad dream, because she could have sworn that kitten had talked. “What’s going on? How are you speaking?”

Tilting his curious head, he answers, “Because I am a cat!” His tail wavers in excitement, “Daniella!”

“W-why am I tied up like this? It’s hot! Help me!” The helpless girl pleads.

“If it’s hot, take of your shirt.”

“No way! That’s embarrassing!”

The kitten stares in confusion, “I am not wearing any clothes; I don’t see your point.”

“But you’re a cat! You have fur!”

“I can’t take off my fur, but you can!”

Sweat is streaming off her face as steam is hitting her red face. Her arms are free to move, so she slides her arms through the sleeves and took off her pink shirt. The cloth falls into the pot in which is sinks from sight. The water is not too clear from all the foggy steam emitted from it. Her blue bra and underwear is all that is left.
1153312.title: Daniella's hot welcoming!

choices: Daniella falls into various ticklish traps in the labyrinth!
She must solve a riddle!
11533122.content:
Hanging upside down by the chains on her ankles, Daniella is suspended above a boiling pot of water with her bra and underwear left on her moisturized body. The girl does not dare to struggle for the off chance that she does escape the chains; she’ll plummet to her death. No, perhaps she would live but with nasty burns. Accompanied by a black kitten that she followed to end up in this nightmarish place, her only hopes is probably somehow convince the feline to save her. “Hey… kitty! If you let me down, I’ll give you food and milk!”

“Me not hungry” The kitten proclaims bluntly. “I want to play!” His tail wags in excitement, “You’re my new toy! Understand?”

“But…” Daniella is slightly cryptic, “What are we playing?”

The fire beneath the pot extinguishes, and the steam from the water abnormally clears up, revealing the purified water. The girl spots a swimming healthy fish.

The kitten licks its mouth by the tasty sight of fish! “How about we play fishing? I’ll lower you into the water where you have to hold your breath. Your goal is to grab that fish with your bare bands. Once you catch that fish, I’ll let you out.”

Seems fair, Daniella is no expert swimmer, so she can’t hold her breath like a professional athlete. However, she believes her stamina of holding her breath will buy her enough time to catch that fish. The water is clear, so she should have no trouble seeing. The only risk that bothers her is what if she can’t grab that fish. She’ll suffocate underwater. “Okay…” She gulps. Taking a few deep breaths to prepare herself, she signals that she’s ready before taking her final deep breath, “I am ready!”

The cat’s yellow eyes glow brightly as the chain that links the girl’s ankle to the ceiling lowers the girl. The chain elongates long enough for Daniella’s face to nearly reach the bottom of the pot. The water feels warm with the water level reaching about her waist level.

A single fish wanders in circle around the girl as Daniella keeps a sharp eye at her target. Her hands quickly reaches towards it, but the fish swims away. Being underwater, her movements feel sluggish. The fish swims behind the girl, at her blind spot, where the girl can’t see the fish at all. Daniella realizes that she can’t turn herself around when she is being hanged by the chains. She suddenly feels something poking her back. Nibbling the piece of cloth, the fish somehow unclips the straps of the girl’s bra. Daniella’s heart rushes and pumps faster. Her arm comes to her rescue by holding the bra against her chest. Desperately trying to grab the fish with her single free hand, she struggles to move in the water. Once she catches the fish, it slips away like a soap bar. Forty seconds has passed by, and Daniella is facing another issue; she can’t hold her breath much longer.

She temporary holds the straps of her bra with her mouth, so she may use both her hands to grab to fish. However, due to being hanged upside down, the bra falls and covers her face, blinding her from seeing. There’s not much time left, so she has no other choice. Her mouth drops the bra as it lay down on the floor of the pot. Meanwhile, her hands attack the fish in both directions, and she catches it. The chains immediately reels the girl back up into the realm of air as she pants. Gasping for oxygen, she tosses the flopping fish at the cat.

The happy kitten catches the fish skillfully with his mouth, piercing the creature with his fangs. As his toy is resting above the pot half wet, he takes his time chewing down the fish down to the bones. Once he finishes his small delicious meal, he licks his paw, “Yummy! Let’s play again! But with a different animal!”

Daniella looks down at the pot, and she sees a orange octopus that’s about a meter big. There is no point to this game for her, and she would normally reject continuing. However, this is also her opportunity of regaining her bra as she is currently covering her chest with her arms. “Fine… But this is the last round. After this, you must let me go!”

The kitten scrutinize the girl excitingly, “Alright, we’ll play another game after this round.” His eyes begin to illuminate light as the chains lower the girl back down into the pot.

Daniella quickly grasp ahold of a mouthful of air as she sinks down with both of her arms ready for action. And octopus should be less mobile than the fish earlier. Her arm reaches out towards, not the octopus, but her bra.
Because the eight-legged sea creature is closer to the blue cloth, it snatched it first. The creature sits on top of the cloth, waiting for Daniella’s response.

It doesn’t matter, now she can obtain the octopus and her bra. She reaches out to grab ahold of the octopus, however two tentacles coils around the girl’s arm, and stuck onto to them with its suction cups. Daniella feels her arm full stretched out, and she doesn’t have the strength to lift the octopus at all. She can’t move her arms! The same pair of tentacles coils even furthers down her arm until it reaches her shoulders. From there, the tips of tentacles begin tickling her armpits.

Daniella tenses up her body, trying her best not to laugh underwater. It’s not worth it, she thought. She would rather give up this round of the game, but it’s too late. The octopus seems to have taken notice of the girl’s stimuli from being touched. The creature begins experimenting as another pair of tentacles strokes along the girl’s tender belly. Noticing that the girl seems flustered as she is violently shaking around, it wonders what happens if he increases the intensity. Another pair of tentacles begins jiggling the girl’s breasts, and another one wiggle within her bellybutton.

“AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” The final tentacle triggers the girl to let out the last breath of laughter underwater. The eighth tentacle wraps around the girl’s mouth and nose, preventing her from swallowing the water. “MHMMMH! MHHHH MMMM!”

Daniella is suddenly pulled out of the water, releasing her from the tentacle’s clutches. She coughs violently and gasps for air.

The kitten stares in disappointment, “Where’s the octopus?” The girl is too busy catching her breath to answer. The black kitten sends a warning, “I’ll give you another chance, but if you fail again, I’ll punish you!”

The tentacles wiggle out of the pot and constrict the girl without warning. The chain that binds Daniella’s ankles snap, and the girl plummets into the pot, crammed with little space. Struggling to free herself, her arms, legs, and waist is coiled by the tentacles. Her head tries to stick out of the water to breath, but the octopus holds her in place. She felt her nipples being the first to be tickled, “Mmm…” Holding her breath, she concentrates on poking her head out the water. When her feet are being stroked, she loses it, “HEHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!”

Her face briefly pokes out of the water to gasp new volume of air until she’s submerged back underwater. The octopus rotates around and sits on top of the girl’s back. Daniella is lying on her tummy at the bottom of the pot. The sea creature squirts out black ink that spread throughout the water, blinding the girl from sight. Everything went black. She feels her arms pinned on the back of her head, while her armpits are mercilessly tickled. Her bare feet are wrapped together as tentacles attacks them, “HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” A stream of bubbles emits from her mouth and rises to the surface of the pot. Squirming helplessly, she suffocates by swallowing mouthfuls of black water, and she cannot inhale any air.

Daniella feels the octopus heavier by the second as the creature increase in size. The pot begins to crack, and water spurts out. In a single expansion, the octopus outgrows the pot and shatters it.

The black kitten scrutinizes the situation, “Oi oi! This is getting out of hand.”

A massive octopus, that is big enough to touch the roof with its head, holds Daniella off the ground, binding her limbs. In a ‘X’ position, the girl’s arms are stretched above her head and her legs are spread wide apart. She coughs and coughs to expel the water and to inhale the oxygen.

The busy tentacles start to attack the girl’s feet, belly, armpits, and nipples. “HEHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA NO! HAHAHAHA! STOP!” She squirms and winces violently, “Plehahahaase! AHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!”
The cat leaps off the stool, “Do you admit your defeat?”

“AHAHAHAHA! YES! AHAHAHAHAHAHA! STOOP! AHAHAHA!”

“Are you sure you want to forfeit the game?”

“HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! Hehehahaha! YE-MHMMMM!” Her answer is cut off as a tentacle muzzles her from speaking.
Twenty seconds has gone by and the cat notices the tears pouring from the girl’s eyes. Extending his claws, the kitten vanishes in a puff of air, leaving behind an oscillation in the puddle. Suddenly, the octopus stops tickling the poor girl. Before it knows what happen, all eight tentacles are lying on the floor with smooth cuts.

Daniella collapses to the ground that’s covered with a layer of water. Panting and gasping, “Y-you… could have… done that… sooner…”

“You’re the one who was supposed to do it for me…” The kitten responds, “You were supposed to catch the octopus, but the octopus caught you instead."

Daniella crawls towards the shattered pot to retrieve her bra, and she clips the blue wet cloth back on, “… Tell me how I can get out of here. I want to go home.”

The kitten points his paw behind him, “Go that way.” Daniella glazes pass the cat, and she see a hallway that turns on the left.

“Okay, thank you.” Daniella quickly rushes down the hallway before anymore crazy things happen.

During her quest, she stumbles upon a fork in the road. She can either go left, or she can go right. Which way should she go? She runs towards right and stumbles upon another fork in the road. She picks a random direction and meets a dead end. She retraced her step, and went the left hallway instead. Over fifteen minutes, the girl is wandering aimlessly around the labyrinth.
11533122.title: Maru's New Toy!

choices: Answer: Which door would the other clown tell me to go?
Daniella guesses randomly wrong!
115331222.content:
Lost, Daniella wanders within the complex Labyrinth in her light blue bikini. So many different combinations of paths that one can take, and no matter which one she chooses, she ends up at a dead end. When she tries to retrace her steps, she finds herself looking at unfamiliar walls.

Roughly five minutes later, she discovers two doors that stand side by side. The left door is blue, and the right door is red. Guarding in front of the two doors are two clowns. Both clowns stand six feet tall with flamboyant, goofy attires. They each wear the color theme of the respected door they each guard behind them.

“Oh, look, my dear brother! We have a lost traveler!” say the red clown.

“Indeed, my brother, shall we help her?” asks the blue clown.

Daniella timidly walks towards them, “Excuse me, can you two tell me which doors will lead me out of here.”

The blue clown informs the girl, “No, we can’t. You can only ask one of us with one question.”

The red clown continues, “But one of us will always lie, and the other will always tell the truth!”

This is becoming puzzling, “… So I can only ask one of you a question and one of you might lie to me or tell the truth to me?”

“That’s right,” the blue clown responds, “But if you wish, you may guess which door is the correct one.”

At first, it seems that Daniella has a fifty percent shot of getting this right or wrong. However, there must be some trick behind this. Which guard is telling the truth? Which one is telling the lies? What sort of question should she ask?
115331222.title: The Classic Riddle!

choices: Vanessa, 14, dark brown hair, preoccupied daydreamer, excitable
Another girl falls into the clutches of the tickling witch
115332.content:
Perhaps it's Vanessa?

She's 14, not too tall or too short, and has dark brown eyes with hair to match, styled back in an open ponytail, curly locks falling to her shoulders. She's also got a German dad and an Egyptian mom, which explains the nose. As if the prominent nose isn't bad enough, she's still got braces. Those sore points aside, her slender frame and Mediterranean features give her an exotic look, and she's finally starting to get curvy (though she's ambivalent about that at present).

Vanessa would like to be popular but, in unguarded moments, has a tendency toward enthusiasm that's just 'not cool' at her age. Additionally, she spends a socially chilling amount of time daydreaming about her alter ego, Nebraska McMillions, lead guitar and vocals for the one-girl band, "Rat-Drawn Shooz". It doesn't matter that Vanessa herself can't sing or play guitar: Nebraska's constantly jetsetting about to the strangest places, garnering new admirers with her dreamy postpunk brimstone ballads, trading crass fame and fortune for acquaintance with outsider sects and induction into esoteric Mysteries.

When properly approached, Vanessa can engage in wide-eyed chatter about any number of offbeat topics, but is normally quiet until finding her comfort level with strangers. Although she's not musically inclined anywhere but in her imagination, she does try to write lyrics Nebraska would approve of. Additionally, she's becoming a competent pool player since her dad bought a table and put it in the garage.
115332.title: Still more choices

choices: Vanessa gives a polite greeting and asks to be invited inside (She gets tickled)
Vanessa can't resist and goes through the window (She's promptly devoured)
1153321.content:
The fall leaves crunch under Vanessa's white sneakers, but she's got her earbuds in and can't hear them. She likes to commune with nature and stuff - anything to get out of Hummer house hell - but she's also fond of daydreaming to music, so a stroll through the local greenbelt with 'Under the Big Black Sun' playing suits her. She likes to namedrop older (hopefully unknown) album titles when pigeonholed about her favorite bands and this one might make the cut, even though the rockabilly elements leave her with some reservations.

The jean jacket that would normally be tied around her waist is instead complementing her blue denim pants in more pedestrian fashion; autumn is biting a little early this year. With a furtive glance out of the very corner of her eye, Vanessa's trying to reach her favorite spot where there's no sign of civilization.

As she finds her vanishing point, a wonderful aroma finds her: someone's cooking something that smells great, and which couldn't possibly reach out here among the trees from McMansion space. Further, it's not the smell of cooking that suggests suburbia at all, a mix of fresh vegetables and bread with sugary undertones that belongs in a rustic chateau in a dense forest a safe ocean's distance away from here. Vanessa's mouth is watering. She turns off her music and follows her capable nose.

There's a problem, right away. The greenbelt is just that, a suburb's token nod at nature that's not much more ambitious than a city park. What Vanessa's wandering into now isn't the nominal spread of cedar, fir and spruce she's familiar with, but a group of trees she's couldn't possibly name or explain... larger and darker, with a canopy so high and layered as to look like proper forest primeval to a kid from a cookie cutter subdivision.

Vanessa gapes, hesitating a moment before walking on, so there's really no problem at all. The fragrance she's following has literally bewitched her, and she couldn't stop herself from proceeding now even if she wanted to. She tells herself that, being the inquisitive type, it would be a shame to turn back now. Besides, this is fodder for another Nebraska episode in her head.

Through pools of green light and darkness, Vanessa trods on with no thought of where she is or how she got there. She's imagining a place set at a table for her already, her plate stacked high with pumpkin ravioli pizza pancake torte. All of her favorites foods rolled into one, the scent lacing around her mind like the tendrils of a grapevine, catching and holding. Everything's gone dreamlike, only the details holding her attention seeming completely real while everything else slips at the edges.

There's a harsh crowing from above, and Vanessa finds herself running toward a half-timbered brick house with a thatched roof, something which has no business in her insipid corner of the world. Or is it a low, circular house made entirely of stone? No, it's a Queen Anne. A hut. It's whatever it wants to be, constantly shifting, but Vanessa can't be bothered by trivial details: the kitchen window is open, and dinner's just inside! If she can manage the window... yes. The house changes, but some features seem to remain stable.

Before she can jump the sill, Vanessa hears a door creak open and is scolded from beyond.

"Tut!" says an old lady's voice, command and contempt piled into one syllable. "Manners, child! Control yourself and make a proper introduction. We enter and exit through doors like genteel young ladies. Or as you please, but at your peril."

Vanessa sees a pair of yellow eyes in the darkness beyond the door, inhuman in their luminescence. Looking again, she realizes she must have had it wrong: it's just an old woman in a dim foyer, waiting to see what she'll do.

She was walking alone in the woods.

Suddenly, she saw an elderly woman walking towards her [she looked like this http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-O6CsX8jDDR4/T8... ]

[I'm going to have two different versions of the story. Version A will be my version and Version B will be another person's version, feel free to write it.]
11533221.title: Jessica, 16, tanned skin, blonde hair, care fre...

115332211.content:
"What are ye doin' out here all on yer own, silly girl? Come with me!" ordered the old woman as she grabbed the girl's arm.

"What? No, let me go! Don't touch me!" said Jessica as she got out of the old lady's grip and ran.

Back at home in her bedroom, she was lying on her tummy on her bed, doing homework.

"Yer goin' to pay fer bein' so disrespectful young lady!" said an old sounding voice.

Jessica turned around to see the old lady standing in her room.

"Omigod! MOM!" screamed Jessica.

"Yer wastin' yer breathe, she's asleep! And she won't be wakin' up until I'm done!" said the old lady.

"Done with what? What are you talking about?" asked the girl.

"On yer back, girl." said the old lady.

"What?" asked the girl.

"I said, on yer back!" said the old lady as the girl's body suddenly flipped over, now on her back.

"Omigod what just happened!? I can't move!" exclaimed Jessica.

"If ye had more respect ye wouldn't be in this situation! I was just goin' to take ye to my house to play with that cute tummy of yers." said the old lady, her ugly face grinning.

Jessica's eyes show open and wondered if she heard that right.

"W-What did you say...?" asked Jessica nervously.

"I said I'll be playin' with yer tummy, girl!" said the old lady as she walked over to where Jessica was lying, her wrinkled hands heading towards the girl's trembling midriff.

"NO! Wait, I'm really ticklish!" said Jessica.

"Good! I knew a pretty girl like you would be nice and ticklish!" said the old woman with glee as one of her old wrinkled hands rested against the teen's bare tummy.

Jessica's tummy flinched as soon as it was touched, and the old woman began to rub the blonde's soft midriff.

"Ooh! Feels so soft!" said the old lady.

"Let me g-EEP!" said Jessica as she was interrupted by the old woman suddenly squeezing the middle of her tummy.

The old woman began to pinch the soft tan skin of the blonde teen's tummy, making her squeal and giggle with each fresh touch.

Jessica struggled to move as the ugly grinning old lady continued to grope at her bare midriff.

Suddenly she was able to move her arms.

"Oh dear, my magic is running out..." said the old woman as she got up off the girl.

The girl stood up and was about to get her mom, but then suddenly the old woman poked her index finger into Jessica's innie belly button, causing her to squeal and fall back onto the bed.

Jessica was giggling hysterically as she was sitting at the edge of the bed as the boney finger continued to wriggle inside it.

She put both hands around the old ladies wrist to and tried to pull it out but the old ladies magic had weakened her.

"Ye silly girl, ye think I'd let ye go without havin' some fun with yer belly button first?" said the old woman, her boney old finger continuing to wriggle in the girl's soft belly button.

The old lady suddenly stops and grabs both the girls arms and pins her onto the bed.

"Yer gonna love this! Time fer tummy raspberries!" said the old lady as her old ugly wrinkled face lowered to the girl's belly.

Jessica gulped as the face came closer to her midriff, then suddenly the old lady blew a huge raspberry on Jessica's tummy, making her squeal and go nuts with giggles as she struggled to get out of the old woman's grip.

Jessica suddenly threw the old lady off of her. Her strength had come back and the old witch ran out of magic.

The frail old woman moaned in pain she struggled to get up.

"MOM!" yelled Jessica and her mom came in the room.

"What is it honey?" said the mom, now able to be awake because of the old ladies loss of magic.

Jessica explained everything and the old lady was arrested.

The end.

115332212.title: Will Kristyn be the Witch's new victim?

choices: The witch enters, tickling the soaked girl.
A Panda Bear comes in with magical bamboo seeds!
1153322121.content:
Illuminating from the glowing orb, the size of a bowling ball, reveals an image that is to be seen by the mystical being. Wavering both of her ancient hands, her mischievous eyes spy on the trail nearby through the orb she possess. A magical orb that shows the past, present, and future of any place and any time, it shall foretell the next victim for the wicked being to torment.

The crystal orb reveals the image of a female youth who is ignorantly strolling down the path to her welcoming trap. Very young, cute, and naïve, she is the one that is to be chosen for the witch’s entertainment. Through her almighty power, the judgment has been casted. Rain, thunder, and lightning, the angry clouds shall approach to the girl’s twist of fate.

Step by step, she saunters down the long and narrow path that is deprived of people. A gust of unwelcome wind streams across the wavering trees as the clouds covers the sky in darkness. Kristyn halts, looking up into the sky curiously, “Is it going to rain?” No one has informed her that there will be rain today, but the weather reporters are never correct these days. A strong breeze blows against her face and waver her hair. A crackle of thunder roars throughout the sky before the heavy rain is dropped from the dark clouds.

The unpleasant weather has Kristyn soaking wet. Her pink tank top, held by thin shoulder straps, is darkening in color by the rain, revealing the outline of her bra. Wearing dark blue shorts that reaches only a few inches passed her underwear, letting her most legs exposed and her cute small feet wears a pair of slight blue flip-flops.

A blink of bright light flashed in a split second, as the roaring crackle of thunder shakes the ground. Forceful winds push the frightened girl off balance, blowing her into the woods. Crawling under a tree, she lets the umbrella of leafs temporarily shade her from the rain. The rapid wind changes direction, blowing the rain to fall diagonally towards the girl. Kristyn wanders deeper into the woods in hope to find some shelter. However, the rain is soaking the earthy soil; it feels like walking on mud where the ground is mushy, slowing her down.

Shutting her eyes, she walks aimlessly until she is stuck! Her legs could no longer take another step forward. Squinting, she sees her feet sinking into the ground. Without a doubt, it is a quicksand. The rain weakens to ground, causing the girl to sink faster than normal. Desperately, she tries to dig herself out with her bare hands, but her hands her stuck as well. Terrified, she struggles to free herself, but it’s futile. Within the next minute, her entire body is engulfed underground.

She feels her body continuing to sink deeper and deeper into the ground. Strangely, a hollow room is right below her as she slips through the mushy ceiling and falls straight down. Springing back and forth on her landing, she nearly has mistaken it as a trampoline. Her arms and legs remains struck as they are entangled in a giant thick spider web. Kristyn is lying on her back, sticking against the enormous web that holds itself by attaching to the walls of the room, suspended from the floor.

During her fall, she felt her feet slipping from her flip-flop. As a consequence, she is barefooted. From a bird’s eye view, her arms are above her head with her armpits exposed, and her legs slightly apart.

Scrutinizing her surrounding, the walls are made of stone, but she cannot see the ground in her position. The ceiling is made out of some kind of mud as if it was meant to be a trap. A few meters in front of her feet is a barred door made of steel as if she’s in prison?
1153322121.title: Kristyn's Twist of Fate!

choices: Her clothes are stripped off!
The web loosens from the wetness, she escapes her cell.
11533221211.content:
An old, ragged, wrinkly human hand slips out from the soft ceiling, followed by second hand. Between them, the mud extrudes spherically as an old lady’s head slowly slips out. The nasty looking witch stares insanely at the terrified girl who’s lying obediently against a spider web, directly facing her. Eagerly, the old figure stretches her torso abnormally like a rubber band. Hanging from the ceiling, an upper body stretches down towards the speechless, frightened Asian girl. In a screechy voice, the witch questions that sounded like a fingernail scratching amongst an old-schooled chalkboard, “Little girl, tell me your most ticklish spot!”

Kristyn tries to tug her arms and legs from the sticky web, but it’s like being glued against duct tape, only that it’s a hundred times stronger. The sound of her heart pumping rapidly prevented her from hearing the question clearly as fear is plugging her ears. She could not tell whether it’s water or sweat that is running down her face. It feels like time has frozen, pausing in suspense.

The witch smiles sinisterly, revealing her yellow teethes, some tooth are missing. She enjoys the feeling of her victim shaking in fear from her very presence. “You look distressed. A pretty girl like you should laugh more,” a pair of hands greedily begins stroking Kristyn’s exposed armpits like the legs of a dancing spider.

A rush of tingling sensations spread throughout her body; the ticklish spot drives her to sing the cute lyrics of giggles and laughter, “AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! HEHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!”

“Wearing wet clothes is not good for you,” another pair of arms sprout out from the witch’s shoulder socket as they pull up the soaked pink tank top up towards the neck, revealing a smooth and tender tummy, along with a wet pink bra. The new pair of arms rushes in to experiment with Kristyn’s tummy, sides, ribs, and bellybutton.

With another spot being tickled, the girl shrieks as her volume skyrockets, “NO! AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! STOP! HEAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” Water from the rain causes her skin to feel slippery, sharpening her sensitivity and making the tickling worse.

“Let’s try here!” Another set of arms sprouts from her shoulder socket, as they nimbly strokes against the soles of the girl’s little cute feet.

Screaming along with her laughter, Kristyn feels a powerful trigger of all of her nerves. “HEHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! STOOOAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! NOOOOO! HEHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!”

The blood rushing towards her face turns it blushing red. Barely even five minutes, the girl faints with tears running from her eyes.
11533221211.title: Kristyn's Introduction

choices: Choice 1
Choice 2
115332212112.content:
Slowly breathing, her eyes drowsily opens, moaning in exhaustion. Taking her time to recall her latest memories, she remembers the storm and how she ends up on the spider web. Haunted by the images, she recalls a hideous demon witch tickling her in the cruelest manner of her life. Like a fog, her mind is a blur; she is unsure if it all really happened or if it’s a dream. Rolling her dark pupils down, she realizes that her tank top is pulled up to her neck, exposing her midriff and bra. What seems to be a dream must have really happened. How is it possible?

Judging by the dryness of her clothes and skin, she must have been unconscious for over an hour at least. As she tugs her arms and legs, she notices the difference of her movement than earlier. Before, she could not even budge an inch; now she can stretch the web to about five inches. Obviously, the web has loosened up quite a bit. Using all of her feminine strength, she pulls of arms and legs closer to her center until she hears a loud rip. The fabric of web snaps apart; Kristyn’s weight is dropped lower until she barely touches the stone floor. Pulling herself up, the gravity pulls her tank top back down. She stands and pulls the sticky web off her body.

Her bare feet steps against the cold stone floor, sending shivers down her spine. Approaching the barred steel door in front of her, she wraps her hands around the bars, peeking through. In front of her cell, a hallway, at least ten feet wide, stretches forward until a corner is met where one must take a left turn. From her angle, she cannot see another hallway. The ceiling in the hallway is about as high as a regular house. Looking at the outside of the barred door, she curiously notices the keys are still inside the keyhole. Is this on purpose? No one could be that stupid.

Slipping her left arm through the bars, she grabs the key and twists it. Just as she hoped, the door is unlocked, and the girl pushes open to take her leave. That was disturbingly easy. Jolting on her two bare feet, she halts at the corner, only to take a peek. The second hallway seems to stretch straight ahead at a dead end with a side route to the right. Kristyn runs quickly to the side route and does not pause. Her breath becomes quick and short. From here on out, each turn she chooses, the path forks into two paths. Some leads to a dead end. It becomes obvious that she is running in a large maze. Occasionally, she would see a black spider crawling on the walls, watching her with their disgusting red eyes. Maybe it’s her imagination, she could have sworn that she saw the words “WICKED” written in red on the spider’s back, but she is too busy running and searching for an exit.

If she has fallen from high above, Kristyn expects to find a staircase or an elevator of some sort to lead her back up. CLANG! Her ears suddenly pick up a loud sound up ahead. Halting by a corner, she leans her back against the wall, huffing to catch her breath. It has been about ten minutes of running, and her body is already getting tired. Her face is covered in sweat, and her pink tank top is soaked as well. The rattling sound seems to be approaching her from the corner, but she does not dare to peek. A smaller sound of a critter crawling beside her on the other side catches her attention. By the time she sees one of those hideous spiders several inches next to her, staring with those haunted eyes, she released a high pitch scream. Flinching back, she leaps reflexively to edge of the corner, landing on her butt.

Kristyn turns her head towards the rattling sound before letting out a small gasp of fear. A giant machine, bigger than a cow, spots the girl. A turtle-like monster, with a tall cylinder glass of clear liquid on its back, crawls towards the girl on its metallic legs. Before the girl has the chance to stand up, metallic arms sprout out from the glass tube to grasp upon the girl’s ankles and wrists. Lifting the girl up with the machine’s tremendous strength, it hovers her over the cylinder that centers on its back. The arms shove her body, feet first, into the glass tube of liquid.

Holding her breath, Kristyn’s entire body is submerged underwater within the tube. The mechanical hands lock her arms above her head and lock her feet against the glass wall, separating her legs. Her feet do not touch the bottom; her entire weight is supported by these long jointed artificial arms. A long hose with a transparent mask is dispatched from below, rising above, it wraps around the girl’s mouth. Kristyn exhales and realizes that the mask provide air for her. The slightly sting of the liquid tells her that it’s acidic, and the scent of the liquid smells like lemons.

As awkward as her position is already, multiple mechanical arms starts to arise from the bottom of the glass tube. Two of those arms, with hands at the end, simultaneously pulls up the girl’s tank top and pulls down the girl’s shorts. At the end, they rip off the clothing and disappear inside the turtle’s shell.

Three arms approach the girl at once, each holding a yellow sponge in their hands. Instantly, they begin scrubbing with the sponge in a circular motion around Kristyn’s tummy and armpits. Laughing in her oxygen mask, she screams, “Ahahahahahaha! Stop! Hehahahahahaha! Noo! Ahahahahahaha!”

Meanwhile, a pair of arms being scrubbing Kristyn’s feet, and another pair of arms is being her toes backwards. This prevents her from scrunching her feet and forcefully tickles her. While she laughs even louder, an arm from behind unclips her bra as a pair of arms scrubs her breasts with sponges. All of the arms scrubs and washes her body entirely, including her arms, legs, back, and neck. During the ten minutes of her unusual bath, all she could do is laugh and squirm, “HEHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!”
115332212112.title: Bath Time In the Maze!

choices: Enter Rebecca's Quest to find her older brother.
Create another girl
1153322122.content:
Childhood:
She once had an older brother who she had loved. Every day, they would play games with each other, care for each other, and look out for each other. At night, they would look up in the night sky that was embellished with stars as well as glance through a telescope to view other worlds. Pluto told his younger sister about the existence of magic and mythical creatures. Rebecca was skeptical and was told that her brother had seen a real witch before. She told him to prove it by showing her the witch, and agreeing upon that, the two of them traveled on foot through the woods.

When crossing an old, shaky bridge made of ropes and wooden boards that connected two cliffs, one of the boards snapped upon the weight of a step, causing Rebecca to fall. Pluto reached out his hand to grab her, but he, too, fell alongside with her.

Waking up one morning in a hospital, Rebecca’s injuries and wounds were able to recover. When she left, the doctors told them that Pluto, her older brother, had died which left the girl in tears. She felt responsible for his death and wanted to prove that magic and mythical creatures do exist.

Present Time (15 year old)- Entering high school, Rebecca worked hard to get the best grades in her classes, feeling as if her brother would be proud of her for doing so. She was a cute and attractive girl who always smiled towards everyone. One day, when she hung out with her friends during lunch, another girl showed her a photo from a cellphone of an image of an older boy strolling in the woods. Dumbfounded, Rebecca saw the uncanny resemblance between the picture and her brother. From then on, she would visit the woods every time after school in hopes to meet and confirm if this boy was the same one in her mind.
1153322122.title: Rebecca

121.content:
Twelve year old Jack loved walking through the woods. It led away from the suburban area he lived in to an abandoned house in the middle of the forest. Jack would walk there for solitude, to do things that he felt couldn't be done at the house.

For instance, he would go in, take off his shirt and walk around the main room before settling down to rest from the walking; or he would hang his shirt on a hook...with him wearing it; or he'd strip down to his underwear or boxers, bind his ankles, gag his mouth, and cuff his hands with things he'd left there, and hop around, making playful muffled grunts as he did.

Anyway, he made it the cottage and, after looking around, went inside. Little did he know, someone else had gotten accommodated in the house and set up security traps. Once Jack took a few steps in, a trapdoor opened up beneath him! "AAAAAH!" he screamed as he plunged down the hole. On the way down, his shirt caught on to two hooks opposite of each other. Unfortunately, he was wearing a muscle shirt, meaning that when it caught, he easily slid out of it.

After falling so long that he could take a deep breath, Jack landed on a gurney, with belts coming to life and strapping down his limbs so that he was in an I position. A door opened and in stepped a woman that looked like 2003FMA Lust...only less revealing...way less revealing. "Who are you?!" Jack asked fearfully.

"My name is of no concern to you," said the woman sharply, "other than that I am a tickle witch."

"A tickle witch?" exclaimed Jack, now going red in the face. "You mean...you tickle people?"

"Yes," said the woman, her face and voice laced with confusion. "Your surprise is different from the others that came here."

"I...liked to be tickled," Jack confessed. "I wanted to tickle myself whenever I came here, but it's not easy when you're doing it to yourself, especially if you have to obey when to stop."

"Hmm," the approaching woman, "I could help with that." She was now at the gurney, eying Jack's bare tummy, armpits, and feet. "But where to start?"

There was a flash of light, and the next thing Jose knew, his socks and shoes vanished, leaving his ankles bare and bound by a rope that suddenly appeared, which also twisted his arms behind his back, forcing him to fall to his knees in a sort of kneeling hogtie. Jose also realized that not only was he rendered shirtless, but his shorts were gone too, leaving his feet, ribs, belly, and armpits wide open. Jose stifled a giggle. "I'm not ticklish."

info.brief_description: This witch likes tickling and eating people. But besides that she's not to bad of a person
info.description:
When I was younger I typed out a story like this but it was pretty bad. Here's the idea in interactive format!

In the modern world there are still some medieval holdouts. Take the witch that lives in that house in the middle of those woods in suburban America. Its a small path that kids use to get home from school and young people use as a jogging trail. What they don't know is in that house there is a witch. Oh to us she just looks like a old woman. But she has powers. You see she loves to tickle people and to eat people. But she isn't very sadistic.

She doesn't kill people you see. Tickle them, cook them, eat them. Sure. But she always keeps them alive and has potions and spells to make these people okay. She usually goes for teenagers. You see what she does is trap them and make them her tickle slaves for awhile. She can create perfect doppelgangers that work to keep people from thinking that these kids have gone missing. All the while they're her tickle slaves and occasional dinner.

You get to tell the stories of the Hungry Tickling Witch and her unfortunate slaves.

Rules
1:Keep it clean. No sex guys, and obviously nothing really sexual.
2:Keep gore to a minimum. If she cooks the character then it shouldn't be super bloody or anything.
3:As a vore fan I like digestion. You can have soft vore+digestion here. However the person has to be reformed somehow which leads to rule 4
4:No permadeath. Temporary fine.
5:Only humans, no furries, pokemon, digimon etc
6:Tickling and Vore are encouraged
7:Minimum age is 10, Maximum age is 24
8:If you are reading PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE ADD!!
